channel.title: The Only Podcast on the Internet
channel.description: The Only Podcast on the Internet is an interview-style show featuring people involved in interested projects, usually categorized under the giant umbrella of "Art". Hosted by Don Denton.
channel.itunes:subtitle: The Only Podcast on the Internet
channel.itunes:author: Happy Collision
channel.itunes:summary: The Only Podcast on the Internet is an interview-style show featuring people involved in interested projects, usually categorized under the giant umbrella of "Art". Hosted by Don Denton.

item.title: The Only Podcast on the Internet Ep.1: Disco Jesus Saves
item.author: Don Denton & Vaughn Irving
item.description: Don Denton interviews Vaughn Matthew Irving about his upcoming Capital Fringe Festival show, Disco Jesus on the Apostles of Funk. Get a little insight into the rigors and rewards of creating and producing a brand new, actor-musician musical.
item.content:encoded:
Don Denton interviews Vaughn Matthew Irving about his upcoming Captital Fringe Festival show, Disco Jesus on the Apostles of Funk. Get a little insight into the rigors and rewards of creating and producing a brand new, actor-musician musical.

Links:

Sponsor: Kris Rogers Bass and Photography

Kris is a musician and photographer based out of Astoria, NY. His work (both on the bass and behind the lens) is stellar. If you need a bass player or a photographer and you live in the NYC area, look no further.

DonDentonActor.com

Don Denton's personal website with information about his acting career.

VaughnIrving.com

Vaughn's personal website with information about his acting career.

CapitalFringe.org

The DC Capital Fringe Festival is where Vaughn's show, Disco Jesus and the Apostles of Funk, will be performed.

Disco Jesus Facebook Page

Save yourself some typing time by using this link. Vaughn would really appreciate it if you "like" Disco Jesus.

Disco Jesus on Twitter

dondenton.com

This isn't Don's site. Well, it is, but a different Don Denton. One who... hosts... trivia? As of today, it hasn't been actually updated in about 6 or 7 years. At least there is a helpful link to DonDentonActor.com at the bottom.

Paul Foreman's Website

This is the guy who wrote Bloodstains in Paradise. The Paul Foreman who co-wrote the music for Disco Jesus and the Apostles of Funk is a different Paul Foreman. He's not this Paul Foreman, either.

item.itunes:keywords: art, theatre, Disco Jesus and the Apostles of Funk, funk, creativity, writing, producing, Capital Fringe Festival, Don Denton, Vaughn Irving
